## Analysis Results

This report summarizes the results from our Python data pipeline.

```{python}
#| echo: false
import json
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Load results
with open('../outputs/results.json', 'r') as f:
    results = json.load(f)

print(f"Mean Y: {results['mean_y']:.2f}")
print(f"Std Y: {results['std_y']:.2f}")
print(f"Correlation: {results['correlation']:.3f}")
```

## Visualization

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "Scatter plot of the data"

# Load and plot data
df = pd.read_csv('../data/processed/cleaned_data.csv')
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
plt.scatter(df['x'], df['y'], alpha=0.6)
plt.xlabel('X')
plt.ylabel('Y')
plt.title('Data Visualization')
plt.show()
```

## Summary

The analysis pipeline successfully processed the data and generated visualizations.
